get.summary: List Virtual Cross Connect Cloud Coverage
get.description:
List Virtual Cross Connects Cloud Coverage.

This endpoint shows which cloud regions are available for the `location_code` your Virtual Cross Connect will be provisioned in.

parameters.name: filters[available_bandwidth][contains]
parameters.description: The available bandwidth to filter on.

parameters.name: filter[cloud_provider_region]
parameters.description: The cloud provider region code to filter on

schema.description: The region of specific cloud provider.

parameters.name: filter[location.region]
parameters.description: The region of associated location to filter on.

parameters.name: filter[location.site]
parameters.description: The site of associated location to filter on.

parameters.name: filter[location.pop]
parameters.description: The POP of associated location to filter on.

parameters.name: filter[location.code]
parameters.description: The code of associated location to filter on.
